General.Name: Far East Smarter Energy Co Ltd
General.Description: Far East Smarter Energy Co., Ltd. provides smart energy and smart city services in China and internationally. It offers aluminum alloy conductors, optical fiber composite power cables, power cables for DC transmission systems, power cables for power transmission, low-smoke halogen-free thin-walled cables for EMUs, aluminum alloy conductor industrial cables, and other intelligent wire and cable products used in smart grid, green building, clean energy, high-end equipment, and smart transportation fields. The company is also involved in the photovoltaic power station, civil construction, EPC general contracting for distributed energy, and power station operation and maintenance businesses; and ternary material lithium-ion batteries for use in passenger cars, logistics vehicles, buses, tour buses, solar energy storage, wind energy storage, base station energy storage, electric bicycles, laptops, and mobile power supplies. The company was formerly known as Far East Cable Corp.Ltd. Far East Smarter Energy Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is based in Yixing, China.
General.Address: No. 6, Far East Avenue, Yixing, China, 214257
